com.getgero.motionsdk.storage

Class StepsDbManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.getgero.motionsdk.storage.StepsDbManager

  • public class StepsDbManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility manager to work with Steps database.

    • Method Detail

      • addStep

        public static void addStep(Context context,
           int time,
           int steps,
           int calories,
           int distance,
           int motionEventCount)
        Add step to the database. Used internally.
        Parameters:
        context - Application context.
        time - Unix timestamp. Identifies minute for steps count. 1 record = 1 minute.
        steps - Steps count.
        calories - Calories count for the current minuted. Calculated based on steps per minute ratio, weight, height and gender.
        distance - Distance in meters.
        motionEventCount - Number of motion events. Used to detect sleep probability.

      • clearDatabase

        public static void clearDatabase(Context context)
        Clear steps database.
        Parameters:
        context - Application context.

      • getCalories

        public static int getCalories(Cursor c)
        Get calories from cursor.
        Parameters:
        c - Cursor.
        Returns:
        calories count in cal. 1000 cal = 1Kcal = 1 calorie.

      • getDistance

        public static int getDistance(Cursor c)
        Get distance from cursor.
        Parameters:
        c - Cursor.
        Returns:
        distance in meters.

      • getEventsCount

        public static int getEventsCount(Cursor c)
        Get movement events count. Use it for sleep detection.
        Parameters:
        c - Cursor.
        Returns:
        movement events count.

      • getSteps

        public static int getSteps(Cursor c)
        Get steps count from cursor.
        Parameters:
        c - Cursor.
        Returns:
        steps count.

      • getTime

        public static long getTime(Cursor c)
        Get time for current steps record in unix time stamp.
        Parameters:
        c - Cursor.
        Returns:
        time in unix time stamp.
